scripts.prepare-patch: sh ./node_modules/elastic-apm-js-core/dev-utils/prepare-release patch && npm run build && npm run release
scripts.prepare-minor: sh ./node_modules/elastic-apm-js-core/dev-utils/prepare-release minor && npm run build && npm run release
scripts.prepare-major: sh ./node_modules/elastic-apm-js-core/dev-utils/prepare-release major && npm run build && npm run release
scripts.release: npm run push-tags && npm publish && npm run github-release
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run buildE2eBundles && npm run runNodeTests && npm run runUnitTests && npm run run-e2e && npm run build-docs
